meanings.definition: Having a puritanical or prudish attitude
meanings.sent1: The bluenosed librarian disapproved of the romance novels in the library.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the bluenosed teacher who never allowed any fun activities in class.
meanings.sent3: The bluenosed neighbor frowned upon the children playing in the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her bluenosed views on modesty made her an outcast among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The bluenosed judge refused to watch movies with any hint of impropriety.

meanings.definition: A person who is puritanical or prudish in attitude
meanings.sent1: The bluenosed at the office always complained about the casual dress code.
meanings.sent2: She was labeled as the bluenosed of the group due to her strict rules.
meanings.sent3: The bluenosed in the book club refused to read anything with romance.
meanings.sent4: He was considered a bluenosed by his friends for his disapproval of their jokes.
meanings.sent5: The bluenosed in the community council opposed any changes to the town's traditions.
